attributes.action: ban those men who have more than 1 wife...........
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have read that imigrants coming to our country are being paid for 3/4 wives, as its ilegal in this country it should be baned, we do not recognise more than 1 wife in our country, they should be paid 'only if they earn' for 1 wife, or leave,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
